definition: Zhang Ning (1975-), PRC female badminton player and Olympic gold medalist
to open up/to spread/sheet of paper/classifier for flat objects, sheet/classifier for votes
abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning

sentences.english: Among them was Zhang Ning, a female badminton player, who impressed me deeply.
sentences.chinese: 但最打動我的是女子羽毛球運動員張寧。

sentences.english: Nice to meet you. I'm Zhang Ning. Welcome to the Olympic Village.
sentences.chinese: 見到您很高興，我是張寧，歡迎來到奧運村。

sentences.english: Maternal immediately of Zhang Ning begins to have report to this matter.
sentences.chinese: 張寧的母親隨即開始對此事進行反映。
